class year_month;

The class {{tt|year_month}} represents a specific month of a specific year, but with an unspecified day. It is a field-based time point, with a resolution of {{lc|std::chrono::months}}.

{{tt|year_month}} is a {{named req|TriviallyCopyable}} {{named req|StandardLayoutType}}.
